recipe.title: Spiced Pistachios
instructions: Line a shallow baking pan with wax paper or parchment paper. Stir together sugar, salt, and spices in a small bowl. Cook pistachios in oil in a 12-inch nonstick skillet over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until a shade darker, about 5 minutes. Stir sugar mixture into nuts and cook over moderate heat, stirring constantly, until sugar begins to melt and coats nuts evenly, 2 to 3 minutes. Immediately transfer nuts to baking pan and cool.
